articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Retail sales came in weaker than expected, another bad sign for the US economy - CNN
articles.description: Spending at US retailers last month was much weaker than expected, in a troubling sign that the American shopper could be starting to tap out.
articles.content:
Spending at US retailers last month was much weaker than expected, in a troubling sign that the American shopper could be starting to tap out.
Retail sales rose 0.2% in February from the prior month… [+4872 chars]

articles.title: Most Americans don't know the dangers of raw milk and bird flu - Earth.com
articles.description: Raw milk can carry harmful bacteria and bird flu. Many people don’t know the risks. Experts say pasteurization makes milk safer.
articles.content: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) detected H5N1 bird flu in raw milk samples from several states in the U.S. Many Americans remain unaware of the health risks associated with consuming raw milk,… [+6044 chars]
